comment: By far, the worst teacher I have ever had. She met with us one-on-one to provide feedback on a lesson-plan project, tell us she was pleased with our performance, and then give us C's when we turned it in. She has the attitude that her class is not doable, but you can try your best if you really want to.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Thomas wasted my time this semester with grueling assignments that no one else had to do to this extent. We wrote over 20 paged lesson plans that would get you a B after spending weeks on it and meeting with her. She is condescending, rude, and makes you feel inferior. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS unless you want a semester of stress.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Dr. Thomas is great! If anyone feel any different then it is probably because she told you something you didn't agree with about your work. She is helpful and breaks things down so well to make sure you understand. Most students who complain are those who talk the whole time in class or are never on task. Dr. Thomas is my favorite professor!

Worst professor in the Education department. She's rude/condescending & constantly changing assignment guidelines and due dates. comment: Okay, so I have mixed emotions about this lady. She is condescending and kind of a bully, but I have an A in her class. Not my first pick, but she's honestly not terrible.
